alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson; Mellette; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 9:40PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Haakon, south central Ziebach, northwestern Mellette and northern Jackson Counties through 1045 PM MDT/1145 PM CDT/... At 939 PM MDT/1039 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles west of Kirley to 7 miles north of Kadoka to 6 miles north of Wanblee. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kirley around 945 PM MDT. Nowlin around 955 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Midland and Belvidere. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 131 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
